description: two images printed on one sheet; image 1: a group of mythological figures around a pine tree; executed in the manner of study drawings for a larger piece; image 2: a boy lying on his left side with arm over head; on a stone pedestal with a small lizard at his feet, animal head under his arm and rose buds in his right hand
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet in black below second image: [ L. P. Boitard sculp]; on sheet above images in black:[ 1/2]; on sheet in pencil: [1-144]
title: Print
